para.p:
fuu is red: baz is green:
Now, fuu is purple: and baz is orange:
Now, fuu is pink: and baz is yellow: Now, baz is orange again: but, fuu is still pink: Now, baz is green again: and, fuu is still pink:

p.text: Green in Red surrounded by Blue
Yellow in Cyan surrounded by Magenta
Red on Green, but Green on Blue!
